raw_comment:
One of the first things I notice is that many of the younger people are spread out on how much they think the world is getting better, and there isn't really a cluster of percentages.

I wonder why older people are so much less optimistic compared to younger people, maybe because of what they perceive as a good thing and a bad thing. 

This could relate to my community in the way that the younger people could be trying to make a difference and move along with the world while older folks will stay behind and not support the changing world.

" Is this world-changing for good"
